overview:
Tom Milligan joined InsideSales.com in September 2012 as the VP of Client Services.

With over 23 years of experience, he is a veteran as a SaaS Customer Operations executive and joins InsideSales.com with decades of leadership and extensive operations success.

As VP of Client Services, Tom will directly oversee all client services, sales engineering, and customer implementation services for the company as it continues to scale worldwide.

Prior to InsideSales.com, Tom served as CEO of Marque Dos, an outsourced contact center focusing on the Latin America and Spanish speaking markets. Previous to Marque Dos, Tom was the Executive VP of Vector BPO, an offshore contact center. From 2002-2011, Tom served as the VP of Worldwide Customer Operations and subsequently served as the VP of Sales at inContact, a leading provider of cloud contact centers software and contact center agent optimization tools. While at inContact, Tom designed and delivered award-winning prospect/customer onboarding, training and support systems and processes.
